CustomField.description: Everything AFTER the "@" in the company's email address. This helps eliminate duplicates with similar names (i.e. @FirstMortgage.com vs. @1stMortgage.com are two different companies).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Everything AFTER the "@" in the company's email address. This helps eliminate duplicates with similar names (i.e. @FirstMortgage.com vs. @1stMortgage.com are two different companies).
CustomField.label: Email Domain
